text: Calicut International Airport is an international airport located in Karipur, Malappuram district of Kerala, India. The airport opened on 13 April 1988. The airport is an operating base for Air India Express and operates Hajj Pilgrimage services to Medina and Jeddah from Kerala. It was the eleventh- busiest airport in India in terms of overall passenger traffic. It is the second-busiest airport in Kerala after Kochi ==References== Category:Airports in India Category:1988 establishments in Asia Category:Kerala
title: Calicut International Airport
